title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 805.2 - Defense and indemnification of members of committees on character and fitness
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 805.2 - Defense and indemnification of members of committees on character and fitness

State Regulations

Members of the committees on character
and fitness in the Third Judicial Department, as volunteers, are expressly
authorized to participate in a State-sponsored volunteer program within the
meaning of subdivision 1 of section
17
of the

Public Officers Law. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22
ยง
805.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
